forgotPasswordPanel.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPanel.forgotPasswordSuccess: Password reminder was successful. An email has been sent with a link to the password reset form.

registerPanel.passwordValidation: Password must contain at least 9 characters, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number
registerPanel.accountExists: Do you already have an account? Log in

groupPanel.addUserDescription: Select users to add to the group by selecting them from the list and clicking the check button. You can also search for users by entering their email address in the search field.
groupPanel.leaveGroupDescription: Are you sure you want to leave the group?
groupPanel.userGroupListDescription: User group list contains all users who are members of the chosen group.
groupPanel.editGroupDescription: Group can be modified by changing its name or adding/removing users. If you caannot remove user from group, it means that user is owner in the group.
groupPanel.selectedUsersValidation: At least one user must be selected
groupPanel.addGroupFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Group hasn't been added.
groupPanel.editGroupFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Group hasn't been edited.

calendarPanel.name: Name
calendarPanel.amountValidation: Amount is required and must be greater than 0 and can only contains digits and comma, not dot
calendarPanel.nameValidation: Name is required and must have at least 3 characters
calendarPanel.periodValidation: Period is required and must be greater than 0
calendarPanel.addIncomeFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Income hasn't been added.
calendarPanel.addExpenseFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Expense hasn't been added.
calendarPanel.deleteTransaction: Are you sure you want to delete the this transaction? This action cannot be undone.
calendarPanel.deleteTransactionFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Transaction hasn't been deleted.
calendarPanel.editTransactionFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Transaction hasn't been edited.
calendarPanel.stopRecurringTransactionFailed: Sorry, something went wrong. Stopping the cyclical transaction failed.
calendarPanel.stopRecurringTransactionSuccess: The recurring transaction was stopped successfully
calendarPanel.renewRecurringTransactionFailed: Sorry, something went wrong. The resumption of the cyclical transaction failed.
calendarPanel.renewRecurringTransactionSuccess: The recurring transaction was successfully resumed

categoryPanel.addCategoryFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Category hasn't been added.
categoryPanel.editCategoryDescription: Category might be modified by changing its name, color or description.
categoryPanel.editCategoryFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Category hasn't been edited.
categoryPanel.deleteCategoryFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Category hasn't been deleted.
categoryPanel.categoryNameValidation: Category name is required and must have at least 3 characters
categoryPanel.categoryDescriptionValidation: Category description is required and must have at least 3 characters
categoryPanel.deleteCategoryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete a category? There will be no possibility of reversing this operation.

analysisPanel.dateOrderValidation: End date must be greater than start date
analysisPanel.lineChartTitle: Chart showing the amount of expenditure by date
analysisPanel.pieChartTitle: Chart showing the amount of expenditure by category
analysisPanel.typePieChartTitle: Chart showing the breakdown of expenditure into one-off and recurring expenditure
analysisPanel.balanceDescription: The balance includes only one-off and recurring expenditure, excluding revenue.
analysisPanel.balanceDescription2: The balance is calculated as the sum of incomes and expenses.
analysisPanel.incomesAndExpensesChartTitle: Chart showing the balance of expenses and revenues for the term
analysisPanel.incomesAndExpensesTransactionsChartTitle: Chart showing expenses and revenues over time

accountActivatedPanel.accountActivatedDescription: Congratulations, your account has been activated. From now on, nothing stops you from planning your expenses!
accountActivatedPanel.accountActivatedError: Your account has not been activated
accountActivatedPanel.accountActivatedDescriptionError: Your account has not been activated. Please try register again later.

accountPanel.editAccountEmailDescription: Changing the e-mail address requires entering the new e-mail address of the user account twice.
accountPanel.editAccountEmailDescription2: Enter a new email address again to confirm the change.
accountPanel.changeEmailFailed: Sorry, something went wrong. Editing the email address failed.
accountPanel.editAccountPasswordDescription: Changing the password requires entering the old password and entering the new password twice.
accountPanel.editAccountPasswordDescription2: Enter new password again to confirm the change.
accountPanel.changePasswordFailed: Sorry, something went wrong. Password editing failed.

accountEmailChangedPanel.accountEmailChanged: Your email address has been changed
accountEmailChangedPanel.accountEmailChangedDescription: Log in again using your new email address.
accountEmailChangedPanel.accountEmailNotChanged: Your email address has not been changed
accountEmailChangedPanel.accountEmailNotChangedDescription: Your email address has not been changed. Please try again later.
accountEmailChangedPanel.accountEmailInitChangedDescription: Your email address has been changed. To confirm the change, click the link sent to your new email address.

adminAccountPasswordSetPanel.adminAccountPasswordSetDescription: Log in to your account with the established administrator password.

adminAccountPasswordSetInitPanel.passwordValidation: The password must contain at least 9 characters, including one digit, one lowercase and one uppercase letter
adminAccountPasswordSetInitPanel.setPasswordFailed: An error occurred while setting administrator password

accountsListPanel.accountDetailsDescription: Account details can by modified by changing its state (disabled, enabled), changing email address or reseting password.
accountsListPanel.accountDetailsDescription2: Reseting password will send an email with a link to set a new password.
accountsListPanel.accountDetailsDescription3: Changing email address will send an email with a link to confirm the change.
accountsListPanel.accountDetailsDescription4: Changing state will cause disabling or enabling the account.
accountsListPanel.accountDetailsDescription5: Admin account cannot be disabled if only one admin exists in system.
accountsListPanel.accountDetailsFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Account details hasn't been edited.
accountsListPanel.editAccountEmailDescription2: Changing your email address requires you to enter a new email address for your user account twice.
accountsListPanel.resetAccountPasswordDescription: Reset account password by clicking the link sent to your email address.
accountsListPanel.changeAccountLanguageDescription: Change account language by selecting new language from the list.
accountsListPanel.changeAccountEnableDescription: Change account status by selecting new status from the list.

accountAfterRegistrationPanel.accountAfterRegistrationDescription: Congratulations, your account has been created. Now yoy need only to activate your account by clicking on the link sent to your email address.

accountForgotPasswordSetPanel.setPasswordFailed: An error occurred while setting new password

accountTabPanel.newAdminAcount: Creating an administrator account will send a message to the e-mail address provided in the form with a link to the administrator password setting form.
accountTabPanel.repeatEmailValidation: Email addresses must be the same
accountTabPanel.registrationSuccess: Admin account registration was successful, an email has been sent with a link to the admin password setting form.

customPaginationActionsTable.resetPasswordFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Password hasn't been reset.
customPaginationActionsTable.resetPasswordSuccess: Password has been reset. Email message containing link to resetting form has been send to user.
customPaginationActionsTable.changeEnableFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Account status hasn't been changed.
customPaginationActionsTable.changeLanguageFailed: Oups! Something went wrong. Account language hasn't been changed.
